snippet.title: Captain Scarlet PS2 gameplay [720p] Playstation 2 ( Blast Games )
snippet.description:
In this video i show the first 3 levels from the PS2 game Captain Scarlet. Each level gives you a different task to perform in order to save the president. While the controls were a little stiff, the gameplay itself was quite entertaining. Most likely due to each level being different. This was just a first test run of the game, but i think im going to enjoy doing a complete play-through of this one. Stay tuned and please subscribe for more retro gaming videos
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNZylG5ZROX7uhBo-GjnHqg

Recorded by SHLIMPOLE
